sources.title: OUTPOST IN SPACE 1959
sources.description: "Outpost in Space" is a 1959 pilot episode that aired as part of the anthology series "Flight." It features a crew on a distant planet who must respond to a distress call from a space freighter about to crash land, highlighting themes of human resilience in a hostile environment. Including Theodore Marcuseâ€™s credits: Korob (as Theo Marcuse) from Star Trek TOS Catspaw 1967 & Robert Gist from Stsr Trek TOS The Galileo Seven 1967.
